official_title: A bill to amend the Cache La Poudre River Corridor Act to make technical corrections, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Cache La Poudre River Corridor Act to replace any reference to Larimer County with Weld County regarding the boundaries of the Cache La Poudre River Corridor in Colorado. Modifies: (1) provisions concerning the establishment of the Cache La Poudre Corridor Commission; and (2) the Commission's duties to include administering the Corridor and providing certain services under the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Cache La Poudre River Corridor Act to make technical corrections, and for other purposes.
